title: New Bard Skin Idea - Celebrity Bard
body:
So I've thought of a new skin idea of Bard which will probably be legendary or ultimate called something like Celebrity Bard (the name will probably be changed).

What's going to be changed:

• Visuals and Special interactions:

  - Bard will look human but he still has a mask, although this one is a normal mask. Also, Bard will be carring an oversized microphone instead of the thing he usually holds.
  - Bard will have completely different quotes, where he acts prestigious and stuff.
  - He will say some stuff to Draven on certain occasions (e.g. if Bard gets a kill and Draven gets an assist on it, Bard will say something like "not today, Draven" and Dravens passive particles will appear on Bard, not Draven (Draven still gets the extra gold from his passive)).

• Bards Passive:

  - Bards chimes are now things like books, DVDs, etc.
  - Bards meeps are tiny little paparazzi that carry around mini cameras and take one picture of Bard as soon as they spawn and occasionally take a picture at random times after.

• Bards Abilities:

  - Bards Magical journey opens up a walkway instead of a portal that has a red carpet on the floor.
  - Bards ultimate causes Bard to imediately pose dramatically. If his ultimate (which looks like a spotlight) lands on someone, extra Bard meeps will spawn around them to take pictures of them. If it doesn't hit Bard, he will say something like "guess the spotlights not on me today" but if it does hit him, extra dtar particles will appear around him and he'll say something like "oh yeah!"

• Extra Effects:
  
  - There will be an option to to press a button on Bards HUD (This button will be something like the button used to choose Elementalist Luxes form) which will cause Bards meeps to take a picture in Bards current pose. It'll open up a close up view from one of the meeps, where you can choose how the picture will be taken. Also, when you take a picture, you can choose if you want to save it to your computer.

Anyway I hope you like my idea of Celebrity Bard!
